subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Freshman Mohamed Sanu ran for two touchdowns out of the Wildcat formation and scored on an 11-yard pass from another true freshman, Tom Savage, as Rutgers routed Central Florida, 45-24, in the St. Petersburg Bowl on Saturday night.
snippet: Freshman Mohamed Sanu ran for two touchdowns out of the Wildcat formation and scored on an 11-yard pass from another true freshman, Tom Savage, as Rutgers routed Central Florida, 45-24, in the St. Petersburg Bowl on Saturday night.
